welcome.title: Welcome to Kavexa!
welcome.description: To get started, select the modules you want to use. You can change this later.

landing.subtitle: Your Smart Business and Personal Finance Assistant
landing.title: Intelligence for your finances.
landing.description: From your personal finances to your small business inventory, Kavexa adapts to you. Choose your modules and start managing everything smarter. Your data stays on your device, ensuring speed and privacy.

tour.step1: Welcome to Kavexa! Let's take a quick tour of the main features.
tour.step2: Use this menu to navigate through the different sections of the app.
tour.step3: Here's a quick overview of your finances: income, expenses, and total balance.
tour.step4: This chart gives you a visual comparison of your income and expenses over time.
tour.step5: From here you can add new products to your inventory or record financial transactions.
tour.step6: Stay up to date with important alerts and recent activities in your business.
tour.step7: All set! You know the basics now. Explore the other sections to discover more tools.
